attributes.action: Force eBay to allow sellers to leave honest feedback
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: eBay have not allowed sellers to leave neutral or negative feedback for buyers who bid or buy and not pay. Therefore we ask the prime minister to force ebay to re-instate the sellers rights to leave negative and neutral feedback once again

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with eBay.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
